name: waterHeatingTemperature_increase
description: This function is used to increase the hot water supply temperature of a boiler.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase the hot water supply temperature.

parameters.name: waterHeatingTemperatureDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to increase the hot water supply temperature.
